thread.title: Sleepy Hollow adds the imposing Peter Mensah as a new villain for season 3 - Sleepy Hollow Cult -
thread.title_full: Sleepy Hollow adds the imposing Peter Mensah as a new villain for season 3 - Sleepy Hollow News - Cult - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: Sleepy Hollow adds the imposing Peter Mensah as a new villain for season 3 - Sleepy Hollow Cult -
text: Ichabod Crane is getting an imposing new enemy in Sleepy Hollow.Peter Mensah will be joining the Fox supernatural drama for a recurring role throughout its current third season, reports TV Line. Â© WENN Beginning in November, Mensah will play an ancient god, Hidden One, who returns to the world of mortals to enact a terrifying plot.Mensah famously played Doctore in Spartacus, and has also been seen in 300, The Incredible Hulk and Avatar.Also ahead for Sleepy Hollow is an exciting crossover with fellow Fox drama Bones just in time for Halloween.Sleepy Hollow airs on Thursdays at 9pm on Fox in the US. Universal Channel airs the series in the UK.
